<JD_START>
Job Title: Executive Search Recruiter

Location: Santa Clara County, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Consulting, Human Resources

Description:
Executive Search Recruiter Santa Clara, CA - On-siteDirect Hire
Option 1 Staffing is hiring! Use your recruiter experience and entrepreneurial drive in a performance-focused environment.We are looking for a self-driven experienced Executive Search Recruiter to join our growing team and be an integral part of our organization’s success. This person will be responsible for developing relationships, consistently delivering value, and effectively building a robust pipeline of existing and new business. This role is dynamic, fast-paced, and engaging.Base + Commission - Uncapped earning potential
Agency experience preferred!
Demonstrated history of success in:Selecting, qualifying, and placing professional-level talent in the Healthcare, Biotech, Fintech, and Tech industries.Establishing credibility through building relationships and expanding business with existing clients and new prospects.Building a diverse rapport of candidates and clients.Multitasking and prioritizing competing tasks.
Responsibilities:Develop and maintain strong partnerships with hiring managers and manage the recruitment process from intake to hire while delivering a world-class candidate and client experience.Manage the Full Desk recruitment life cycle including sourcing, screening, interviews, and offer negotiation.Have a strong understanding of ATS or CRM, LinkedIn Recruiter, Zip Recruiter, Bullhorn, and additional recruiting tools.Be a forward-thinking, self-starter with the ability to successfully provide exceptional service and want to make a difference… the experience is key!
Qualifications:Have a successful track record in recruiting and client account management and development.5+ years’ experience in full-cycle recruitmentAgency experience highly preferredBachelor’s degreeProactive self-starterSolid work ethicAbility to work independently in a collaborative environmentExperience using Bullhorn is a plus!
$50,000-$60,000 plus commissionJoin our company and work with a stellar team!Actively interviewing now!
Option 1 Staffing is an award-winning, statewide, recognized leader in staffing and recruiting, specializing in placing the highest caliber of Non-Clinical Healthcare, Information Technology, Supply Chain, Administrative/Office, and Accounting/Finance professionals in contract and direct-hire opportunities. We work with top and emerging companies in the Technology and Healthcare industry.
We Offer:Competitive BenefitsMedical InsurancePTO401KCompany Outings & Happy Hours!
“Best of Staffing Award"Best of Staffing Award is the only award in the U.S. that recognizes staffing agencies that have proven superior service quality based entirely on ratings provided by their clients and job candidates. Award winners make up less than 2% of all staffing agencies in North America.“Workforce Logiq Top Performer Award”Top Performer Award by Workforce Logiq highlights high-performing staffing companies who are chosen based on a variety of criteria critical to our client's satisfaction, including customers serviced, cycle time, submittals per requisition, percentage of submittals hired, program compliance, fill ratio, and more.Member American Staffing Association Since 1991.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
<JD_END>
